analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nakusalaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā akusalo saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na kusalam na saraṇam dhammam paccayā akusalaḥ saraṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nakusalaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naabyākataṁ
analyzed: na kusalam na araṇam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ araṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na abyākata

original: naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakusalaṁ naaraṇañca
analyzed: na araṇam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ araṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na kusalam na araṇam ca

original: naabyākataṁ naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na abyākatam na araṇañca dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ araṇaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
